But here you were new! And there were so many babes to start your harem. You are...

Now, who should your first conquest be? The first of your worshippers who will want to become obscenely fat, just fir you?

125311.content:
“And that concludes our lesson class”

All the other students packed there stuff and left, but you stayed. You admired your target for a few seconds. Ms. Masters, or Grace as she wanted to be called, was a knockout.

She could have been a pornstar instead of a teacher.

You walk up to her.

“Did you need something Dana?”
125311.title: The start of an inappropriate relationship

choices: You go to her apartment. Sparks fly
You go to her apartment. You get nowhere
1253111.content:
Your heart raced for a second.

Was that too forward?

But Grace smiled.

“You wouldn’t be the first to try to get to me to improve their grade. But you are doing fine in class.”

She sat on her desk, legs crossed.

“You wouldn’t even be the first girl.”

“But you might be the first success. Come to my apartment after 6.”

You left shocked. That... worked?
1253111.title: Closer to the teachers pants

choices: Tell the truth. You already seduced her
Leave hints that you like fatter women around. She’ll fatten herself up
Something else
12531111.content:
You put on your best dress and makeup. Shannon asks

“Where you going?”

“Out” is all you reply.

You get to the teachers apartment, feeling like a criminal.

Grace opens the door.

“Right on time.”

She is also dressed up. Your knees tremble.

“Please, come in. I have dinner waiting.”

You enter, and sure enough, there is a candle lit dinner, with some chicken and salad.

“I hope you like chicken.”

The two of you eat, talking. Surprisingly you share a lot of common interests. After Grace finishes her chicken, she leans back and says

“Ohh that was good. Gotta be careful though. My metabolism isn’t what it used to be.”

You wish you could tell her how hot that was.

“Now, I know why your here. I could get into a lot of trouble here, but I want you. My bedrooms back that way.”

This was going better than even your most wildest dreams.

Grace takes you to the bedroom. She lays down on the bed.

“Undress for me.”

You do. You are now nude.

Grace pulls you down on her for a kiss.

“I think this year will be interesting...” she says

You are now in a dedicated, of secret relationship with Grace Masters.

But how will you convince the knockout teacher you want to feed her until she’s round?

125311111.content:
It’s been a whirlwind of a month.

Ever since that first night, you and Ms. Masters, or just Grace as she prefers to be called in private, have been meeting up for midnight rendezvous almost every night.

You share knowing looks in class.

She still grades you farely, to not raise suspicion, and you even agree to have you fail one quiz.

One night, you lie in bed with her, her spooning you with her generous bosom, when you work up the courage.

“Hey Grace, I have something to tell you.”

You turn to face her, inches away from her beautiful face.

“Well something tell me you aren’t pregnant.” She laughs.

“No, you see, I have this... thing. I think your gorgeous, but to make me even happier, I want to feed you till your obese.”

Grace looked taken aback. You worry that you scared her off.

“Well if that’s what you want, I have ice cream in the freezer.”

You are excited. It worked!

“That’s not all. I want to have my own harem of girls, all getting fat for me. Are you Ok with that?”

“Ok with that? I’ll help you! But first, the ice cream.”

You get up and retrieve the ice cream. With a spoon, you feed it to your lover. With each spoonful she Moans. Eventually, you pour the remaining soup down Graces throat.

“Wow. If eating around you is going to be this fun, I can’t wait to get fat. And soon there will be more of me, all wanting to pleasure you, and eachother. Here’s how I can help you...
125311111.title: From the Heart

choices: Shannon. Let’s start local
Let’s turn Ana into a Gordita

1253111111.content:
The next day, You arrive at Grace’s apartment. As you enter, you notice that she is eating chocolate cake, and sitting in front of a white board.

“Sit down. I wanted to make sure we didn’t forget to supersize me while planning on who to fatten up first.”

You sir down and put your hand on Graces engorged stomach.

Grace puts pictures of a trio of girls.

“Here are our prime candidates. Per your request, they are all fit, so you can fatten them up.”

“First: your roommate, Shannon. She’s cute, if a little unsure of herself. To get her to agree to do this, I would use the same tactic as me: seduce her, make her feel wanted. That way when we ask her to pork up, she’s more receptive.”

“Next we have Ana. She’s a feisty one. But she loves her heritage more than anything. I have some writings about how Latin American women would be worshipped for their size. Of course, we want her to worship YOU, so we have to be careful.”

“And lastly, we have Valerie. She’ll be a tough nut to crack. But I think we can both agree how hot it will be to see that lean fit body get flabby. My advice: make getting fat more attractive than exercise.”

“Also, don’t neglect me. I want to be fat too.”


“So, who’s first?”
1253111111.title: The prime three

info.brief_description: You are a guy/gal going into college to look for one thing: a Harem of hot Babes to fatten
info.description:
Welcome to Kaspern University! You are either Dale, a football scholarship winning Athlete, or Dana, an art major.

You are interested in women, but you have another desire: to have a harem of thin, gorgeous women get fat for you. And what better place than college to make that dream come true?

Some rules first

NO male weight gain

NO Scat, or Slob

ALL girls are 18 or over

NO instant gains or magic formulas: The gains here are all gluttony based.

Now let’s meet the prime candidates for your quest.

Valerie (19) Blonde, Captain of the girls soccer team.

Shannon (18) Brunette, shy freshman

Abigail(20) Purple hair, a punk girl.

Ana(19) a fiery Latina in charge of Latin American club.

Sally (21) a redhead party girl.

Haley (20) a green haired nature enthusiast.

Grace Masters (25) a raven haired young professor of social sciences.

And possibly more...

All these girls are in peak physical condition.

Until they meet you.
